channel.title: Project Zeta
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/HENBR.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Introduction:[/size][/b] [b]I once started a project with the eye on improving delta, many months later, there has been so much changed that it just can't be called a delta anymore. Apart from the main design everything has been rewritten from scratch. I'm still working on this project, but I decided to make a small project and release it to the public. The idea for this server was using my own base for the biggest part, keeping it as noobfriendly as possible and keeping it clean, ready to be made a good server from.
For this release I tried to bring back oldschool rsps skilling, which wasn't hard since everything was so basic.[/b] [/center]
[b][size=18pt]Project Zeta:[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Packaged[/li] [li]Everything extremely organized[/li] [li]A lot of information blocks[/li] [li]Cleaned from all unnused content[/li] [li]Nutrition (pots & food)[/li] [li]Basic npc clipping[/li] [li]Worldwide all pickables[/li] [li]Boat traveling system[/li] [li]New shop adding system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li] [li]New stair handling system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li] [li]New unique dialogue handling system from scratch; extremely easy usage[/li] [li]... actually everything is made for easy usage but still being decent[/li] [li]Rewritten dying handling[/li] [li]My global object system that has been released as a tutorial, you can read up about it there[/li] [li]fighpits and jad minigames written from scratch[/li] [li]All skills written with the eye on how it was on 05-06 rsps's[/li] [li]Runs on grahams event manager[/li] [li]Prayer handling written from scratch[/li] [li]NPC handling system written from scratch (extreme easy design for adding, yelling, aggresivity, new npcs ect... everything..[/li] [li]PvN & PvP written from scratch[/li][/ul]
[b][size=18pt]Media:[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CrN1k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XVrGB.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XKYcw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2VPxD.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YRivr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uMSRf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ooExV.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7z8sY.png[/img]
[b][size=18pt]Notes:[/size][/b] - There are barely npc spawned, shops and no training area or population of cities. ^ For the simple reason that this was NOT meant to be a server ready to host, BUT a clean server where you can make from what you want with a decent base. - It's possible that some content will still contain bugs or are not completely finished, since I never hosted this for public and tested everything alone. - Though you will see a lot of recognition with delta, this is not a delta anymore, c&p tutorials will not turn out for you, know this before you start pming with your errors. - All bugs you find you can pm me, I will help you to fix them, ofc only if its a part of my content.
[b][size=16pt]Credits:[/size][/b] - Me for programming this server - Team Rocket for [b]support[/b], inspiration and a hand of help - Lostmyphat for a hand of help (though you got more than enough back from me trolo) - Delta & Spades for the absolute starting base
[b][size=16pt]Links:[/size][/b]
[b]Source download:[/b] [url=http://up.ht/NzVoXZ]http://up.ht/NzVoXZ[/url]
Some clients that should work: [url=http://up.ht/NzXg36]http://up.ht/NzXg36[/url] (377 with a bunch of customs and 269 hitsplats or something) [url=http://up.ht/NzXdUW]http://up.ht/NzXdUW[/url] (377 clean with added music system) [url=http://up.ht/NzXdV0]http://up.ht/NzXdV0[/url] (474+)

item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Si Force:

This looks like a pretty decent base to start off with to be honest, I think I may use this for a ‘pet project’ of mine. I haven’t had a look at the base fully yet, so I won’t judge it, but it seems encouraging enough from your description.

I’ve spent a lot of work on it, thanks to hear such nice comment from you.

item.title: Project Zeta
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

the elve age:

How far advanced from Utopia?

where the release of utopia was aimded for a clean organized and improved delta,
this one was aimed to be a decent and noobfriendly base, ready to be continued on by downloaders
pvp, pvn & npchandling all written from scratch, & other shit, make this a unique base and the clean organization and a lot of info blocks should make this perfect for people wanting to try something new and for people actually wanting to learn something without it being to complicated for beginners like, hyperion ect

Read full topic

item.title: Project Zeta
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

why does Process extend Thread? it should implement Runnable

   private static String worldMapFiles[] = {"World1.xml", "World2.xml", "World3.xml","World4.xml", "World5.xml"
	   , "World6.xml","World7.xml", "World8.xml", "World9.xml","World10.xml", "World11.xml", "World12.xml","World13.xml"
	   , "World14.xml", "World15.xml","World16.xml", "World17.xml", "World18.xml","World19.xml", "World20.xml"
	   , "World21.xml","World22.xml", "World23.xml", "World24.xml", "World25.xml"};

???

what’s the point of this unnecessary bit of code?

    public String getMessageB(int itemID){
        switch(itemID){
            case 6570: 
            	return "Caves minigame.";
        }
        return "";
    }

other than that… I have no other concerns. (other than the creating client per class… -.-)

Look’s like a decent improvement.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Zeta
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

This looks nice.
The 474 client works perfectly with this? Or is it a look-a-like client.
What skills are added? If you add too many then the noobies won’t be able to learn how to add them themselves.

shank beast:

I am using ide but, i don’t know how to make a run.bat… or how to run it through ide.

You have to start a new java project with existing source. Then make a new run configuration for a java application (not applet) and give it a name then search for the main class (server.java usually) and then click run.
That’s for Eclipse anyways, idk what it’s like for Netbeans or Intellij IDEA

Read full topic
